long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool to create go-links: easy-to-remember shortcuts to underlying URLs. For example, you can point "go/roadmap" to the Google Slides file with your roadmap. Any user within your company typing in "go/roadmap" in Chrome, like a URL, will be taken to that file.
